name: Extra flags for 4chan
tagline: Extra Flags for 4chan boards, supports /int/, /sp/ and /pol/.
body:
Extra Flags for 4chan. ========== Originally made for /int/, but we support /sp/ and /pol/ now as well. Made by /ref/ and flags contributed by various /ref/ and /int/ posters. Your flag not here? Create an issue on the [github page](https://github.com/flaghunters/Extra-Flags-for-int-)
![Extra Flags for 4chan](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/flaghunters/Extra-Flags-for-4chan/master/misc/screenshot1.png) HOW TO INSTALL (Desktop - Chrome/Firefox/Opera) ========== 1. Download GreaseMonkey for Firefox, TamperMonkey for Chrome or ViolentMonkey for Opera. 2. Install the Extra Flags script: [Extra Flags for int.user.js](https://github.com/flaghunters/Extra-Flags-for-int-/raw/master/Extra%20Flags%20for%20int.user.js) 3. Set your region to one of the following [flags](https://github.com/flaghunters/Extra-Flags-for-int-/tree/master/flegs) 4. Reload the page 5. Post from Quick Reply box (QR) (top form does not work) Video install guides (needs to be replaced) ========== [![Chrome install webm](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/flaghunters/Extra-Flags-for-4chan/master/misc/chrome-install.png)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/flaghunters/Extra-Flags-for-int-/master/misc/chrome-install.webm) [![Firefox install webm](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/flaghunters/Extra-Flags-for-4chan/master/misc/firefox-install.png)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/flaghunters/Extra-Flags-for-int-/master/misc/firefox-install.webm) [![Opera install webm](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/flaghunters/Extra-Flags-for-4chan/master/misc/opera-install.png)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/flaghunters/Extra-Flags-for-int-/master/misc/opera-install.webm) If webms do not play try them here: [/ref/](https://archive.whatisthisimnotgoodwithcomputers.com/ref/thread/6/). HOW TO INSTALL (Android Firefox) ========== Mobile addon for Android Firefox needs updating and doesn't currently work.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
